test_case: Given the user is on the login page\nWhen the user enters valid credentials\nThen the user should be redirected to the dashboard

Given the user is on the forgot password page
When the user enters their registered email
And the user clicks on the reset button
Then the user should receive a password reset link in their email

Given the user is logged in
When the user navigates to the profile page
And the user updates their profile information
Then the profile information should be saved successfully
